S01visvantu:202_2: ca tābhyāṃ pāṃsunagarāṇi kṛtāni. imāni ca tayoḥ krīḍanakāni. tau tu na paśyāmi. atha
S01visvantu:202_3: vā aṃbā na dṛśyata iti parṇakuṭīṃ praviśya śayitau bhaviṣyataḥ
S01visvantu:204_0: ity evam āśaṃkāparigatahṛdayā sutadarśanalālasā mūlaphalāny ekānte upanikṣipya bāṣpāmbupariplutekṣaṇā
S01visvantu:204_1: bhartuḥ pādayor nipatya pṛcchaty āryaputra kva gatau tau bāladārakāv iti. viśvantara uvāca
S01visvantu:206: tasya tau bālakau dattau tāv anujñātum arhasi //
S01visvantu:208_0: athaivam uktā mādrī viṣadigdhaviddheva mṛgī bhūmau nipapāta. jalāśrayoddhṛteva matsī
S01visvantu:208_1: pṛthivyām āvartanaṃ parivartanaṃ karoti sma. hṛtapoteva kurarī karuṇakaruṇaṃ virauti
S01visvantu:208_2: sma. pranaṣṭavatseva ca gaur bahuvidhaṃ haṃbhāravair vilalāpa. āha ca
S01visvantu:210: duḥkhitāv ananubhūtaduḥkhakau kāṃ gatiṃ mama gatau hi putrakau //
S01visvantu:212: katham adya nu putrakau mama vrajato 'nyasya vaśena duḥkhitau //
S01visvantu:214: na ca me 'dya sudṛṣṭakau kṛtau kṛpaṇair jīvati duḥkhitau bata //
S01visvantu:216: kṣāntimārdavaiḥ sadā gurupriyau duḥkhitau hi paramaṃ sutau mama //
S01visvantu:217: jñātimātṛparihīnakau ca tau bandhubhiś ca sahasā nirākṛtau /
S01visvantu:218: durjanaṃ janam upetya pāpakaṃ duḥkhitau hi paramaṃ sutau mama //
S01visvantu:219: kṣuttṛṣāparigṛhātmakau sadā kasya tau vaśam upāgamiṣyataḥ /
S01visvantu:220: ārttiduḥkhaparipīḍitau ca tau preṣyabhāvam upayāsyato dhruvam //
S01visvantu:221: karma nūnam iha pāpakaṃ mayā anyajanmani sudāruṇaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S01visvantu:222: prāṇinaḥ priyaśatair viyojitā yena gaur iva viraumy adharmikā //
S01visvantu:223: yena satyavacanena me sadā sarvasatvasamatāṃ nataṃ manas /
S01visvantu:224: tena satyavacanena me sutau dāsabhāvagamanād vimucyatām //
S01visvantu:226: tato mādrī tābhyāṃ bāladārakābhyāṃ ye vṛkṣā ropitakāḥ pālitakāś ca tān kisalayasaṃchannāṇ dṛṣṭvā sasaṃbhramā pariṣvajyovāca
S01visvantu:228: cetanā iva rudanti vṛkṣakā bālakāḥ stanavihīnakā iveti //
S01visvantu:230: punaś ca tayor bāladārakayoḥ krīḍanakāny āśramavāsino mṛgaśāvakān dṛṣṭvā karuṇādīnavilaṃbitair akṣaraiḥ vacanam uvāca
S01visvantu:231: duḥkham etad aparam hy analpakam yad ramanti mṛgaśāvakā ime /
S01visvantu:234: tato mādrī yena mārgeṇa tau bāladārakau gatau taṃ mārgam anusarantī tayor bāladārakayor itaś cāmutaś ca padāny ariktakāni dṛṣṭvā tīvraduḥkhābhyāhatā punar uvāca
S01visvantu:236: kvacid gatau gatāvṛttau hā nṛśaṃsa dvijottama //
S01visvantu:238: tau hi me hariṇapariplutākṣakau komalaiś caraṇakaiḥ kathaṃ gatāv iti //
S01visvantu:240: tato bodhisatvas tāṃs tathāparidevanātmikāṃ dṛṣṭvā tābhis tābhiḥ śrutibhir anityatāpratisaṃyuktābhiḥ bahuprakāram anusaṃjñāpayann uvāca
S01visvantu:241: na darpān na ca vidveṣān mayā tyaktaṃ sutadvayam /
S01visvantu:242: sarvasatvahitārthaṃ tu tyaktau tau dustyajau sutau //
S01visvantu:245: tyāgādhiṣṭhānān mādri putrau yadā te tyaktau dustyājau lokanirmokṣaṇārtham /
S01visvantu:246: dadyāṃ svāṃ dārāṃ vāhanaṃ cāpi vittaṃ sarvaṃ sarvebhyo dātum eṣā matir me // ity
S01visvantu:247: (Viśv 53) atha mādrī dhairyam ālaṃbya cittena bodhisatvam uvāca
S01visvantu:248: na karomy antarāyaṃ te mā te bhūn matir anyathā /
S01visvantu:249: mām apīcchasi ced dātuṃ nirviśaṃkaḥ prayaccha mām //
S01visvantu:252: tam arthaṃ prāpnuhi kṣipraṃ tāraya tribhavāj jagat //
S01visvantu:254_0: tataḥ śakro devendras tad atyadbhutam atiduṣkaraṃ mādryā bodhisatvasya ca vyavasāyam
S01visvantu:254_1: avagamya tridaśagaṇaparivṛta upari vihāyasā tadāśramam upagamyodāreṇāvabhāsena tad
S01visvantu:254_2: vanam avabhāsya gaganatalastha eva bodhisatvam uvāca
S01visvantu:257: tvam eko niḥsaṃgas tyajasi tanayāṃ snehajanakāṃ
S01visvantu:258: dhruvaṃ kṣemaṃ śāntaṃ vimalam arajaṃ prāpsyasi padam //
S01visvantu:260: tad evaṃ protsāhya bodhisatvaṃ śakro devendraś cintayāmāsa:
S01visvantu:261: eko 'yam upasthāyakarahitaḥ khedam āpatsyate. yanv aham apy asmāt prāthayeyam iti. tato bodhisatvasakāśād apakramya brāhmaṇaveṣam āsthāya punar bodhisatvam uvāca
S01visvantu:264: (Viśv 56) tato mādrī saṃjātāmarṣā niṣṭhurābhidhānena taṃ brāhmaṇam uvāca
S01visvantu:265: nirlajjaś cāsi lubdhaś ca tvam iha brāhmaṇādhama /
S01visvantu:266: saddharmaniratāṃ yas tvaṃ mām icchasi pativratām //
S01visvantu:268: tato bodhisatvaḥ karuṇāparigatahṛdayo mādrīṃ nirīkṣitum ārabdhaḥ. atha mādrī bodhisatvam uvāca
S01visvantu:269: na śocāmy aham ātmānaṃ nāpekṣā me tathātmani /
S01visvantu:270: yathā tvām anuśocāmi katham eko bhaviṣyasi //
S01visvantu:272: aham iha bhuvi mādri nānuśocyaḥ parimṛgayaṃ padam akṣayaṃ viśokam /
S01visvantu:273: tam imam anusara dvijaṃ viśokā mṛgaśaraṇaṃ tv aham āśrame 'bhyupaimi //
S01visvantu:275: idam asmiṃ vane dānaṃ paścimaṃ me bhaviṣyati
S01visvantu:277: iti viditvā mādrīṃ ca pāṇinā gṛhītvā taṃ brāhmaṇam uvāca
S01visvantu:279: mama bhāryām imāṃ śiṣyāṃ gṛhāṇa tvaṃ dvijottama //
S01visvantu:283: tato mādrī bāṣpoparudhyamānā gadgadakaṇṭhī brāhmaṇavaśam āgatā patiputraduhitṛvirahitā idam abhravīt
S01visvantu:284: kīdṛṅ mayā kṛtaṃ karma anāryaṃ pūrvajanmasu /
S01visvantu:285: naṣṭavatseva gaur yena viraumi vijane vane //
S01visvantu:286: (Viśv 61) tataḥ śakro devendro brāhmaṇaveṣam antardhāpya svaveṣeṇa sthitvā mādrīm uvāca
S01visvantu:287: na brāhmaṇo 'smi subhage na ca mānuṣo 'smi
S01visvantu:288: śakras tv ahaṃ hy asuranāśakaraḥ surendraḥ /
S01visvantu:290: tad brūhi kiṃ varam apīcchasi matsakāśāt //
S01visvantu:295: tathety uktvā mahendraḥ punar āśramaṃ praviśya bodhisatvasakāśam abhijagmivān. mādrīṃ ca vāmena pāṇinā gṛhītvā bodhisatvam uvāca
S01visvantu:296: ahaṃ mādrīm imāṃ tubhyaṃ dadāmi paricārikām /
S01visvantu:297: na ca te kasyacid deyā nyāsadroho hi garhitaḥ //
S01visvantu:299_0: tataḥ śakro devendras taṃ bāladārakaparigṛhītāraṃ brāhmaṇaṃ tathā vyāmohayāmāsa yathānyanagaraśaṃkayā
S01visvantu:299_1: tad eva nagaram upagamya tau bāladārakau vikrītum ārabdho yāvad amātyair dṛṣṭvā rājño niveditaṃ
S01visvantu:300: etau putrasya te putrau brāhmaṇo 'smin purottame /
S01visvantu:301: jālinaṃ ceva kṛṣṇāṃ ca vikrīṇīte ti dāruṇaḥ //
S01visvantu:302: (Viśv 64) etac chrutvodbhrāntacittaḥ sa rājā prāha kṣipraṃ darśayadhvaṃ kumārau /
S01visvantu:303: nāryaś cakruḥ krośam antaḥpurasthāḥ paurā rājñaḥ kṣipram eyuḥ samīpam //
S01visvantu:311: tam ihānayata kṣipraṃ patnyā sārdhaṃ sulocanam //
S01visvantu:312: (Viśv 66) tataḥ śakro devendro bodhisatvam abhinamasyamānaḥ svabhavanam upajagāma.
S01visvantu:314: śakreṇa ca rājani viśvāmitre abhyatīte brāhmaṇāmātyapaurajānapadaiḥ sārdhaṃ tad āśramapadaṃ gatvā bodhisatvaṃ yācitvā svapuram ānīya rājye pratiṣṭhāpitavān.
S01visvantu:316: tato viśvantaro rājā sarvaṃdado babhūva. sa śraṃanabrāhmaṇavanīpakasuhṛtsambandhibāndhavānujīvijaneṣu anekaprakārāṇi dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate
S01visvantu:322: prāpnuvanti narāḥ śuddhim asmiṃ loke paratra ceti //
S01visvantu:324: yadā viśvāmitreṇa rājñā viśvantaranimittaṃ jujjukāya brāhmaṇāya prabhūtaṃ dhanaṃ dattaṃ tadāsau vistīrṇavibhavo jātaḥ. tasya suhṛtsambandhibāndhavā mitrāṇi cāgamya kathayanti:
S01visvantu:325: yā kācit tava śrīsaubhāgyasaṃpat sarvāsau viśvantarakumāram āgamyeti. sa kathayati:
S01visvantu:327: dakṣiṇīyo lokasya; yena mama bhogā upanayanti.
S01visvantu:330_0: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau viśvantaro nāma rājakumāra aham eva sa tena kālena
S01visvantu:330_1: tena samayena. yo 'sau jujjuko brāhmaṇa eṣa evāsau devadattas tena kālena tena samayena.
S01visvantu:330_2: tadāpy eṣa akṛtajñaḥ akṛtavedī. etarhy apy eṣa akṛtajña akṛtavedī. tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ
S01visvantu:330_3: evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yat kṛtajñā bhaviṣyāmaḥ kṛtavedinaḥ svalpam api kṛtaṃ na nāśayiṣyāmaḥ,
S01visvantu:331: prāg eva prabhūtaṃ. ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
